description: PHQ-9 total score (sum of DPQ010–DPQ090; 0–27; missing/invalid codes set to NULL).
Outcome indicator: 1=early-onset (<50 at diagnosis proxy), 0=not early-onset; defined only for ever-cancer cases.
hsCRP category based on concentration: low(<1), average(1–3), high(>3).
hsCRP concentration in mg/L (raw LBXHSCRP; not LOD-imputed).
Smoking status: never / former / current (derived from SMQ020, SMQ040).
